Description of incident: Bank customers in California, Wisconsin and Missouri are reporting fraudulent ATM withdrawals that are tied to transactions conducted with the Hancock Fabrics retail chain. The Hancock Fabrics store in Napa was the "common thread" among the numerous people who reported credit and debit card fraud. The store had recently replaced its point-of-sale machines. At about the same time, as many as 70 Wisconsin victims reported suspicious ATM withdrawals from their accounts.
